metaData.label: MON, TUE or FRI
metaData.criteriaDescription: Call_Day_Of_Week equal Monday OR Call_Day_Of_Week equal Tuesday OR Call_Day_Of_Week equal Friday

criteria.default_path_1: <FilterDefinition><ConditionSet Operator="OR" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><Condition IsEphemeralAttribute="true" Key="Event.DEAudience-5a55d5fd-ddd8-33f2-fdfb-441bdd538e16.Call_Day_Of_Week" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{}"><Value><![CDATA[Monday]]></Value></Condition><Condition IsEphemeralAttribute="true" Key="Event.DEAudience-5a55d5fd-ddd8-33f2-fdfb-441bdd538e16.Call_Day_Of_Week" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{}"><Value><![CDATA[Tuesday]]></Value></Condition><Condition IsEphemeralAttribute="true" Key="Event.DEAudience-5a55d5fd-ddd8-33f2-fdfb-441bdd538e16.Call_Day_Of_Week" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{}"><Value><![CDATA[Friday]]></Value></Condition></ConditionSet></FilterDefinition>
criteria.b8abfece-27ba-7a61-a7e4-af6449976416: <FilterDefinition><ConditionSet Operator="AND" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><Condition IsEphemeralAttribute="true" Key="Event.DEAudience-5a55d5fd-ddd8-33f2-fdfb-441bdd538e16.Call_Day_Of_Week" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{}"><Value><![CDATA[Thursday]]></Value></Condition></ConditionSet></FilterDefinition>
